newsitem.title: HONG KONG: CITIC Pac mgmnt to hold shares long term.
newsitem.headline: CITIC Pac mgmnt to hold shares long term.

text.p: CITIC Pacific Ltd management members who purchased shares in the conglomerate from its parent company intended to hold the shares as a long-term investment, the two companies said in a joint statement.

"All the 65 members of the management to whom the CITIC Pacific shares were allocated have confirmed in writing to CITIC Hong Kong their respective intention to hold the CITIC Pacific shares for the purpose of long-term investment," it said.

CITIC Pacific and its parent, China International Trust & Investment Corp Hong Kong (Holdings) Ltd (CITIC Hong Kong), said the acquisition of the CITIC Pacific shares by the management team led by chairman Larry Yung was completed on Wednesday.
The companies said on December 30 that Yung and his management team would buy 330 million CITIC Pacific shares representing about 15.47 percent of the company at HK$33 each.
CITIC Pacific shares ended down HK$0.20 at HK$40.60 on Wednesday.
